author: Parex Network
title: Raccoonswap
shortDescription: Raccoonswap allows users anywhere in the world to trade PRX without...
description: Raccoonswap allows users anywhere in the world to trade PRX without an intermediary. Raccoonswap is the largest decentralized exchange (or DEX) operating on the Parex blockchain.

author: Parex Network
title: Bridge
shortDescription: A cross-chain bridge dApp enabling seamless transfers of PRX and USDT between Parex and BSC Networks...
description: A cross-chain bridge dApp enabling seamless transfers of PRX and USDT between Parex and BSC Networks. Users can securely swap assets across chains with minimal latency, ensuring fast and efficient transactions

author: Parex Network
title: Stake dApp
shortDescription: A staking dApp where users can stake SPRX to participate in mining and earn rewards...
description: A staking dApp where users can stake SPRX  and LP Token to participate in mining and earn rewards. The platform ensures secure and efficient staking with transparent reward distribution.
